title: gRpc with Mutiny with external proto files does not compile (n.MutinyGrpcGenerator: not found)
body:
### Describe the bug

I use a few modules to compile gRpc clients with external location of proto files, one module per one set of proto files. It does compilewithout Mutiny support, and it does not compile with Mutiny support.


### Expected behavior

Should be compilable and generate gRpc code with Mutiny plugin

### Actual behavior

It does not compile - PROTOC FAILED (...) n.MutinyGrpcGenerator: not found
Please check details as described in reproduction

### How to Reproduce?

Full reproduction of the bug defined [here](https://github.com/siudeks/tech-spikes/tree/master/bugrepro_grpc_mutiny)

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux Home1 5.10.60.1-microsoft-standard-WSL2 #1 SMP Wed Aug 25 23:20:18 UTC 2021 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk 11.0.14 2022-01-18

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.7.2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
